sitedata.metadesc: Trusted By Fine Real Estate Professionals

about.abouttext2: Smart planning and smart design make for a more thoughtful approach to “community”;  from neighborhood planning to landscape architecture to playground design and beyond, where the trails are designed to take you anywhere you want to go in Banning Lewis Ranch. The Community of Banning Lewis feels like that of a small town where neighbor greets neighbor all in the proximity of city amenities.
